Articles.Content:
Just started using B9, and the number of parts is amazing, but overwhelming. I haven't build any planes as a result (I find it hard enough with stock parts... ), but I have flown most of the new stock aircraft.

If anyone has any tips, pictures, guides, building ideas (like a non-plane vehicle) or anything else related to B9, please post them here.

Thanks in advance!

There happens to be this thread chalked full of what you're asking for already, you can find it here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25241-0-21-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R3-3-New-pods-IVAs-engines-fuselages-structures

There happens to be this thread chalked full of what you're asking for already, you can find it here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25241-0-21-B9-Aerospace-Pack-R3-3-New-pods-IVAs-engines-fuselages-structures

Thanks! I'll check it out.
